Mod.name: intense baseball v1.4
Mod.author: meso
Mod.description: batter up with a multitude of balls!

triplet.name: Flaming Baseball
triplet.description: A punishing baseball that deals damage over time.

whirlwind.name: Chilling Baseball
whirlwind.description: Bad damage. Slowing aura. Freezes opponents.

spello.name: Psychic Baseball
spello.description: High knockback and mediocre damage. Fragile.

deflect.name: Mirror Baseball
deflect.description: Low initial damage, but becomes more powerful and faster as you deflect it.
